results.content: The course was terrific, Anthony explains every topic in a straightforward way. Thank you so much!
results.content_html: The course was terrific, Anthony explains every topic in a straightforward way. Thank you so much!

results.content: This is an essential course BEFORE trying to learn other JS libraries and frameworks like React or Angular! Excellent content. Great teaching style. Effective examples! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! The course needs a little updating but still worth your time and effort (I took this course in July of 2022)
results.content_html: This is an essential course BEFORE trying to learn other JS libraries and frameworks like React or Angular! Excellent content. Great teaching style. Effective examples! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! The course needs a little updating but still worth your time and effort (I took this course in July of 2022)

results.content: Loved this course, and would have been a no-brainer recommendation if I had taken this several years ago. Unfortunately, the course has not been updated as well as it should have been in terms of ES6 content. There are a few ES6 lectures, but they are not of the same high quality as the rest of the series. Personally, I was really excited for the Promises/Async/Await section but it was a huge let-down and left me even more confused than before. The rest of the course is wonderful and a must-watch, however.
results.content_html: Loved this course, and would have been a no-brainer recommendation if I had taken this several years ago. results.content:
Great course, definitely recommend!
The course delivery was indeed very good for me, I found it really engaging to follow and the author demonstrated a very good mastery of the subjects.
I took it to catch up with 'weird' parts of JS because I was coming from other strongly typed programming languages and the result was above my expectation.

results.content: The only JavaScript course on Udemy that will actually help you understand the core of JavaScript language. Just like understanding the workings of JVM helps you become better at Java, understanding CLR makes you a better C# programmer, similarly understanding JavaScript runtime will definitely make you a better JavaScript programmer. Note that this course is not about web development, or DOM, etc. this is about JavaScript, the language.
results.content_html: The only JavaScript course on Udemy that will actually help you understand the core of JavaScript language. Just like understanding the workings of JVM helps you become better at Java, understanding CLR makes you a better C# programmer, similarly understanding JavaScript runtime will definitely make you a better JavaScript programmer. Note that this course is not about web development, or DOM, etc. this is about JavaScript, the language.

results.content: Best on earth to understand Javascript
